channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drains unable to cope with flash flooding, 24th November
item.description:
The drains indicated in the location on the map have insufficient capacity to manage the flash flooding. This has resulted in the road becoming impassable and is occurring on an increasingly regular basis.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blacksmiths Lane, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large branch fallen o to garden path, 24th November
item.description:
45 Mendip Road Cheltenham GL52 5EB. Large and heavy branch has fallen this morning into my garden path. I have moved it onto the grass so it is not blocking exit and entrance to property but needs removing. Furthermore there ar still broken branches hanging dangerously over my garden which need attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Mendip Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Water not draining away. Road flooded in both directions. Our flood defences are working ok

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road drains are blocked outside number 22,16 Cheltenham Rd Winchcombe and drains in road outside 86/88 Gloucester Street Winchcombe, 24th November
item.description:
Drains outside 16, 22 Cheltenham Road Winchcombe and drains outside 86/88 Gloucester Street Winchcombe No water can get down these drains causing it to flood down the roads. The issue has been present for several months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe

item.title: Tree down behind 4 Mimosa Avenue, 24th November

item.title: A tree has blown over blocking a path, 24th November
item.description:
A tree has blown over on the pathway between Wisteria Court and Mimosa Avenue. It is leaning and putting pressure against the fence of 4 Mimosa Avenue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Wisteria Court, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gulleys, 24th November
item.description:
The 3 gulleys along this section of the northern side of London road have been blocked ever since a water main burst years ago and the road had to be closed for repairs, the water washed sand and gravel into the gulley pipeline and was never cleared after completion of road reinstatement. When the weather freezes the water turns to ice across the junction with Haywards road and makes it particulary hazrdous for pedestrians trying to cross this road as well as having to walk the gauntlet of the london road in heavy rain without vehicles drenching people. Please ask the question to relevant authority of why these gulleys have not been cleaned in years .despite someone being paid tax payers money to so
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 214, London Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree by lych gate, 24th November
item.description:
A dead tree fell t 7:40pm last night (23rd November 2024) opposite 4 Green Lane Cottages, Green Lane, GL3 3RB. It snapped and fell (onto a man's car but luckily he and his car were OK). We dragged the top of the tree into the nearby ditch. A passing delivery driver wrenched the fallen stump out of the path of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
